sources.title: 1935 Blutsbrüder ( Brigitte Horney, Attila Hörbiger)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1935. Blutsbrüder. u.a mit Brigitte Horney und Attila Hörbiger

metadata.Plot: An enhanced and sentimentalized story of love, honor, rivalry, and retreat. The traditional laws of the patriarchal environment and severe conflicts of the heart. The action takes place in Herzegovina and Stolac, Bosnia. The film depicts the Bosnjak from a German point of view.
metadata.Actors: Brigitte Horney, Carl Esmond, Attila Hörbiger
